member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.GLCTEntitySearchImpl.ChangeTypeOnEntity(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Method to call to retrieve the GL Control Type description for an entity. This method is called when adding types to entities to validate the type does not already exist for the entity and to return the description for display purposes.
